name: Castle Generator [Wall Only]
description:
I'm wanting to get into procedural generation and just created this project to have fun and get into it. It's very satisfying when everything works like it should and I want to hopefully one day create one that has all sorts of features.

Also yes, it is very performance heavy, I think because of the lighting as the buttons lag even before generating. I used URP for this project so that is probably why. Though I'm happy it is still running on WEBGL.
